titles.title: Dairy Production Termination Enforcement Act of 1988
A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to establish joint liability for certain breaches of contracts made under the milk production termination program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

bill.summary: 1/27/1988--Introduced. Dairy Production Termination Enforcement Act of 1988 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to make jointly liable with the producer for program violations any person who: (1) acquires, and uses or makes available for milk production, any milk production capacity idled under a dairy termination program producer contract; and (2) knows that the producer is prohibited from making the facility available to another person. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to notify each facility owner regarding program compliance.
